name: MasterChefVoltV3
description: The (older) MasterChefVoltV2 contract gives out a constant number of VOLT tokens per block. It is the only address with minting rights for VOLT. The idea for this MasterChefVoltV3 (MCJV3) contract is therefore to be the owner of a dummy token that is deposited into the MasterChefVoltV2 (MCJV2) contract. The allocation point for this pool on MCJV3 is the total allocation point for all pools that receive double incentives.

eventDecorators.name: Add
eventDecorators.description: emitted after each successful withdrawal. Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.name: Deposit
eventDecorators.description: emitted after each successful withdrawal. Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.name: EmergencyWithdraw
eventDecorators.description: emitted after each successful withdrawal. Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.name: Harvest
eventDecorators.description: emitted after each successful withdrawal. Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.name: Init
eventDecorators.description: emitted after each successful withdrawal. Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: emitted after each successful withdrawal. Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.name: Set
eventDecorators.description: emitted after each successful withdrawal. Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.name: UpdatePool
eventDecorators.description: emitted after each successful withdrawal. Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.name: Withdraw
eventDecorators.description: emitted after each successful withdrawal. Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

functionDecorators.name: MASTER_CHEF_V2
functionDecorators.description: Address of MCJV2 contract.

functionDecorators.name: MASTER_PID
functionDecorators.description: The index of MCJV3 master pool in MCJV2.

functionDecorators.name: VOLT
functionDecorators.description: Address of VOLT contract.

functionDecorators.name: add
functionDecorators.description: Add a new LP to the pool. Can only be called by the owner. DO NOT add the same LP token more than once. Rewards will be messed up if you do.

parameterDecorators.name: _lpToken
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the LP ERC-20 token.

functionDecorators.name: deposit
functionDecorators.description: Deposit LP tokens to MCJV3 for VOLT allocation.

parameterDecorators.name: pid
parameterDecorators.description: The index of the pool. See `poolInfo`.

functionDecorators.name: emergencyWithdraw
functionDecorators.description: Withdraw without caring about rewards. EMERGENCY ONLY.

parameterDecorators.name: pid
parameterDecorators.description: The index of the pool. See `poolInfo`.

functionDecorators.name: harvestFromMasterChef
functionDecorators.description: Harvests VOLT from `MASTER_CHEF_V2` MCJV2 and pool `MASTER_PID` to this MCJV3 contract.

functionDecorators.name: init
functionDecorators.description: Deposits a dummy token to `MASTER_CHEF_V2` MCJV2. This is required because MCJV2 holds the minting rights for VOLT. Any balance of transaction sender in `dummyToken` is transferred. The allocation point for the pool on MCJV2 is the total allocation point for all pools that receive double incentives.

parameterDecorators.name: dummyToken
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the ERC-20 token to deposit into MCJV2.

functionDecorators.name: massUpdatePools
functionDecorators.description: Update reward variables for all pools. Be careful of gas spending!.

parameterDecorators.name: pids
parameterDecorators.description: Pool IDs of all to be updated. Make sure to update all active pools.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: pendingTokens
functionDecorators.description: View function to see pending VOLT on frontend.

parameterDecorators.name: _pid
parameterDecorators.description: The index of the pool. See `poolInfo`.

returnDecorators.name: pendingVolt
returnDecorators.description: VOLT reward for a given user.

functionDecorators.name: poolInfo
functionDecorators.description: Info of each MCJV3 pool.

functionDecorators.name: poolLength
functionDecorators.description: Returns the number of MCJV3 pools.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: set
functionDecorators.description: Update the given pool's VOLT allocation point and `IRewarder` contract. Can only be called by the owner.

parameterDecorators.name: _pid
parameterDecorators.description: The index of the pool. See `poolInfo`.

parameterDecorators.name: overwrite
parameterDecorators.description: True if _rewarder should be `set`. Otherwise `_rewarder` is ignored.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: updatePool
functionDecorators.description: Update reward variables of the given pool.

parameterDecorators.name: pid
parameterDecorators.description: The index of the pool. See `poolInfo`.

functionDecorators.name: userInfo
functionDecorators.description: Info of each user that stakes LP tokens.

functionDecorators.name: voltPerSec
functionDecorators.description: Calculates and returns the `amount` of VOLT per block.

functionDecorators.name: withdraw
functionDecorators.description: Withdraw LP tokens from MCJV3.

parameterDecorators.name: pid
parameterDecorators.description: The index of the pool. See `poolInfo`.
